alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 5:32PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern La Paz and Maricopa Counties through 630 PM MST... At 531 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Bagdad to 20 miles north of Aguila to 6 miles west of Congress. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust with visibility down below one mile. Locations impacted include... Gladden, Alamo State Park and Aguila. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 68 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MST for south central and west central Arizona.
